unnormalised: Arrey yaar, vegetables are so expensive these days! I went to Dadar market yesterday and 1 kg of tomatoes was ₹80! And the onions, bhai, Rs. 60 per kg. I remember last month, it was only ₹40/kg. These vendors are really increasing the prices. Even a small nimbu pani outside the station costs Rs. 20 now.
normalised: Arrey yaar, vegetables are so expensive these days! I went to Dadar market yesterday and one kilogram of tomatoes was rupee eighty! And the onions, bhai, rupee sixty per kilogram. I remember last month, it was only rupee forty per kilogram. These vendors are really increasing the prices. Even a small nimbu pani outside the station costs rupee twenty now.
